new_map.name: Mystic Mazes
new_map.description: A labyrinth of bewildering passages and enigmatic rooms, each with its own unique charm and challenge, created by a long-forgotten civilization.

room_1.name: Entrance Hall
room_1.description: The grand entryway to the Mystic Mazes, with towering stone arches and flickering torches lining the walls.

room_2.name: Echoing Chamber
room_2.description: A room where even whispers can be heard bouncing off the stone walls, creating a cacophony of echoes.

room_3.name: Hall of Whispers
room_3.description: A narrow corridor filled with gentle whispers, though the source can never be found.

room_4.name: Chamber of Reflection
room_4.description: This room is lined with mirrors that create an endless maze of reflections.

room_5.name: The Verdant Atrium
room_5.description: A serene garden room filled with exotic plants and the sound of a bubbling fountain.

room_6.name: Flooded Grotto
room_6.description: This room is partially flooded with clear water, reflecting the glow of luminescent algae on the ceiling.

room_7.name: Hall of the Ancients
room_7.description: A solemn hall lined with statues of forgotten deities and heroes.

room_8.name: The Library of Shadows
room_8.description: A vast library where the books seem to absorb light, cloaking the room in semi-darkness.

room_9.name: Chamber of Echoes
room_9.description: A room where sound is amplified, making every footstep and breath thunderous.

room_10.name: The Crystal Sanctum
room_10.description: The heart of the maze, resplendent with glowing crystals and the promise of ancient magic.

mystic_archer.name: Mystic Archer
mystic_archer.description: Mystic Archers are known for their ability to imbue their arrows with magical properties. They are equally skilled with the bow as they are with spellcasting, allowing them to utilize a combination of ranged attacks and magic to control the battlefield from a distance.
